# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly enhance your experience and productivity. Considering its high quality and unique features, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory price of $75. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. Looking forward to your positive response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $75. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $75
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
